title: [Ta'Vaalor, Amaranth Court]
description: A small stonework cottage sits near the wey, a cobblestone path leading straight into its front door.  The cottage's stone walls have been painted with a pale gold wash, and the door stained a deep crimson.  A thick maoral sign swings from the doorpost.

A small stonework cottage sits near the wey, a cobblestone path leading straight into its front door.  The cottage's stone walls have been painted with a pale gold wash, and the door stained a deep crimson.  A thick maoral sign swings from the doorpost, illuminated by a lantern mounted atop the ironwork post.

The charred remains of a small stonework cottage sit at the edge of the var, covered in soot and ash. The roof has collapsed inward, and various chunks of stone litter the cobblestone path that leads to the structure.  Workers toil away at cleaning up the debris under the watchful eye of a squad of soldiers.

A squat, square limestone building stands at the edge of the var, a cobblestone path stretching to its front door.  The outside of the building has been painted a pale brick red color, and a thick maoral sign swings from the doorpost, illuminated by a lantern mounted atop the ironwork post.

A squat, square limestone building stands at the edge of the var, a cobblestone path stretching to its front door.  The outside of the building has been painted a pale brick red color, and a thick maoral sign swings from the doorpost.
